Name: Carta Nostra
About the game: -Travel to a beautiful island Immerse yourself in the sounds and colours of a small Sicilian town, a carefully crafted and hand-painted setting and characters - A story of revolt against Mafia oppression Become a protagonist in an engaging story of struggle against the injustices of the underworld, help the animal citizens to redeem their rights and their territory. - Choose which cards to play! - Defeat the mafia by choosing the cards in your deck, you must be careful: not all cards bring positive results - Sensational visual effects Every time you play your card, you activate its effect: energy bombs, storms, music and much more...
Meta Title: Carta Nostra: Feb 1, 2023, Digital Mosaik and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Carta Nostra? Check out the release date (Feb 1, 2023), developer insights from Digital Mosaik, and a complete game summary.
